response.summary:
Frontend engineer with over 3 years of expertise, specializing in Javascript and related tools like React, Relay, GraphQL. Also, well-versed in Linux and Docker. I'm passionate about continuous learning and growth in both personal and team settings. Believing in the power of collaboration, I prioritize fostering a positive team culture that emphasizes best practices and continuous learning.

For me, the real essence of software development lies in the people behind the code, and I'm dedicated to creating a thriving environment for creativity and productivity.
response.skills: Leading Development Teams, Technology Leadership, Flas, jQuery, Embedded Linux, Hardware, Material-UI, Relay, Docker, React.js, JavaScript, Linux, Electronics, Product Development, Scrum, Front-end Development, Flask, Python, Embedded Systems, Git

profile_positions.description:
I am currently the leader of the developers' team of various nationalities including Colombia, Mexico and India.

We developed the frontend of a web application for network operation in the telecommunications center of excellence (CoE) at NTT Data. Symphony, our application, seeks to be a centralizer of the entire network process.

Part of the stack that we handle is React Js, Relay (Graphql Client), Flow (for typing), MUI, and Docker.

Beyond feature development, we've achieved significant milestones:

- Internationalizing the application and support 3 languages.
- Updating and maintaining libraries.
- Sustaining and enhancing the design system.
- Acquiring in-depth knowledge in Relay and GraphQL.

Furthermore, we've emphasized knowledge sharing, creating detailed documentation and delivering talks to onboard new teams from different countries.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer Team Lead

company.name: NTT DATA Europe & Latam
company.description:
NTT DATA – a part of NTT Group - is a top 10 global IT services provider, headquartered in Tokyo, with over 150,000 employees. 

We help clients transform through consulting, industry solutions, business process services, IT modernization and managed services. 

NTT DATA enables clients, as well as society, to move confidently into the digital future. We are committed to our clients' long-term success and combine global reach with local client attention to serve them in over 50 countries.
